item.title: Hiding PE Imports
item.description: You’ve spent the last hour cheffing up a spicy, homemade, Windows executable just right for your target. Go to compile it and, sweet, there are no errors. Fire up the isolated VM and give it a few test runs and it’s working great. That ASCII art is looking mighty clean I must say. Time to send it downrange. Upload completes and you can see it on the file system. PS C:\Users\ksoze> .
